column4: I'm constantly tempted to try this open WLAN that reaches my room from somewhere.
someone just got arrested for using someone else's open WLAN where I live, be careful!
I wonder how they could find out who I am :D

in this case it was obvious, they were a registered sex offender so they knocked at his door first. got lucky. he wasn't doing anything illegal over the network though, the owner of the WLAN called it in to the police instead of bothering to block the MAC
